Lake_Elsinore.Rancho Capistrano:
Rancho Capistrano, is a private, gated community surrounded by the Cleveland National Forest, in Riverside County, California.
It is located within the Morrell Potrero, in the Elsinore Mountains, northwest of Elsinore Peak. The potrero, drained by Morrell Canyon Creek, a tributary of San Juan Creek, was originally the site of the Morrell Ranch.
